issue.title: [CF 791] Can't swap or copy icons
issue.body:
In tinkering with my TMW setup, I noticed that when I tried to swap or copy icons within a group or between groups, I got an error and no apparent copying or swapping resulted. It happens with all the icons I try.

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Right-click on an icon. 2. Drag it to an empty slot (for copying) or an occupied slot (for swapping.) 3. Click copy or swap on the menu that pops up.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead? I expect the icon to be swapped or copied. Instead, BugSack plays its error sound ("Fatality!") and the icons remain as they were.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version) r752.

Do you have an error log of what happened? Yes, from BugSack.

``` Message: ...ns\TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Common\IconDragger.lua:272: attempt to index global 'IE' (a nil value) Time: 04/17/13 14:36:35 Count: 1 Stack: comments.body:
r752 is more than a week old. Please upgrade to the latest version of TMW before submitting bug reports.

Edited Apr 17, 2013

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
